Name: Grateful Dead
Ingredients: 15 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
15 ml Giffard Framboise de Ronce (raspberry liqueur)
15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: SHAKE first 7 ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass. TOP with soda.
History: An LA Iced Tea with berry liqueur in place of green melon liqueur.
Nutrition: One serving of Grateful Dead contains 238 calories
